snippet: The chief executive of HSBC’s Asian operations called for Asian governments to abandon their guarantees of bank deposits, saying they amount to inappropriate assistance to weak banks.
lead_paragraph: HONG KONG  The chief executive of HSBC’s Asian operations called on Friday for Asian governments to abandon as soon as possible their guarantees of bank deposits, saying they amount to inappropriate assistance to weak banks at the risk of imposing a costly burden on taxpayers.

headline.main: HSBC Executive Calls Deposit Backing Unfair
